name: Hùng Phù
tagline: Senior React Native Engineer | Fintech & AI-Driven Mobile Solutions
bio:
Senior React Native Engineer with 5+ years of experience building and scaling fintech mini-apps within MoMo's Super App ecosystem. Strong background in mobile architecture (MVVM, monorepo design), secure financial integrations, and automation testing strategy.

Experienced in leading technical initiatives, integrating AI-driven workflows, and designing LLM-powered mobile solutions. Passionate about building scalable financial systems with high reliability and long-term maintainability.
